item.title: Jail problem
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

SunSpec221:

I don’t code Bluurrs clients or servers so i can’t help.

Bluurrs SERVERS? I’m confused, totally. I thought it was still Jagex’s material? 

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights > 0) {
	String args = command.split("-");
	try {
		if(args.length == 2){
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.toX = 2933;
				p.toY = 3285;
				p.action = 0;
				p.sM("You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
				sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
			} else {
				sM("That player is currently offline.");
			}
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
	}
}

I have not a clue why it would say that, unless they’re offline.

Read full topic

item.title: Jail problem
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

Hello,
I have a problem with my Jail. I can jail someone but when I try to unjail it keeps saying ''This person doesn’t excist" for some reason. Plz help me!

    [code=javascript]   if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
		sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }[/code]

That’s my code.

Read full topic
